tool_description: Create shipping labels using different carriers, calculate shipping prices, manifest, carrier pickup, eVS & ePostage certified.
name: IB Shipping Labels
title: IB Shipping Labels

api_list.name: Get a Pickup
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ib-shipping-labels.p.rapidapi.comhttps://api.myibservices.com/v1/pickups/12"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ib-shipping-labels.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ib-shipping-labels.p.rapidapi.comhttps://api.myibservices.com/v1/pickups/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ib-shipping-labels.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get City

headers = {

        }

api_list.name: Reprint Manifest
